alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 16 at 4:36AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Van Buren, western Cleburne, east central Conway and north central Faulkner Counties through 515 AM CST... At 436 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whipple, or 9 miles south of Clinton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fairfield Bay... Greers Ferry... Quitman... Damascus... Twin Groves... Higden... Fairbanks... Whipple... Sugar Loaf Recreation Area... Bee Branch... Edgemont... Southside in Van Buren County... Morganton... Martinville... Hill Creek Recreation Area... Pearson... Narrows Marina... Eden Isle... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for central and north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Conway; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County
